mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_IMAGE, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_COUNT, PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_OPTION_NAME, CART_NO FROM "CART" JOIN "PRODUCT" USING(PRODUCT_NO) LEFT JOIN "PRODUCT_OPTION" USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
